name: Defend the Nukes!
description:
Fast Instructions:

- Left mouse button to fire main cannon, careful to not overheat it!

- Use the mouse to collect pieces from robots as resource!

- Right mouse button on each of the technologies with enough resources to use them.

- Trap doors will summon new allies.

- The cannons will fire enemies for a couple of seconds.

- After activating themines, right click on them again to explode.

- Defend the nukes through all waves! if one get destroyed, the game is over!

Good Luck!
